name: @saeon/ol-react
description: React wrapper for the open-source OpenLayers JavaScript library, envisioned as a generally useful, opinionated means of interacting with OpenLayers within a React.js application

scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && TC=utc node ../../../scripts/publish.js -p  @saeon/ol-react -s patch
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && TC=utc node ../../../scripts/publish.js -p  @saeon/ol-react -s minor
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && TC=utc node ../../../scripts/publish.js -p  @saeon/ol-react -s major

author: zach@saeon.ac.za
